00071 class RBFN_Interface : public RBFN, virtual public ModelInterface
00072 {
00073   public:
00074     RBFN_Interface( unsigned numInput, unsigned numOutput, unsigned numHidden )
00075       : RBFN( numInput, numOutput, numHidden )
00076     {
00077         ModelInterface::w.resize( b.nelem( ) +
00078                                   A.nelem( ) +
00079                                   m.nelem( ) +
00080                                   v.nelem( ) );
00081         ModelInterface::dmdw.resize( odim( ),
00082                                    b.nelem( ) +
00083                                    A.nelem( ) +
00084                                    m.nelem( ) +
00085                                    v.nelem( ) );
00086         ModelInterface::dedw.resize( b.nelem( ) +
00087                                    A.nelem( ) +
00088                                    m.nelem( ) +
00089                                    v.nelem( ) );
00090         getParams( ModelInterface::w );
00091     }
00092 
00093     void initialize( const Array< double >& in,
00094                      const Array< double >& out )
00095     {
00096         RBFN::initialize( in, out );
00097         getParams( ModelInterface::w );
00098     }
00099 
00100     void model( const Array< double >& in, Array< double >& out )
00101     {
00102         setParams( ModelInterface::w );
00103         recall( in, out );
00104     }
00105 
00106     void dmodel( const Array< double >& in )
00107     {
00108         setParams( ModelInterface::w );
00109         gradientOut( in, ModelInterface::dedw );
00110     }
00111 };
00112 
00113 class RBFN_MSE : public RBFN_Interface
00114 {
00115   public:
00116     RBFN_MSE( unsigned numInput, unsigned numOutput, unsigned numHidden )
00117       : RBFN_Interface( numInput, numOutput, numHidden ) { }
00118 
00119     double error( const Array< double >& in,
00120                   const Array< double >& out )
00121     {
00122         setParams( ModelInterface::w );
00123         return mse( in, out );
00124     }
00125 
00126     double derror( const Array< double >& in,
00127                  const Array< double >& out,
00128                  bool returnError = true)
00129     {
00130         setParams( ModelInterface::w );
00131         double e = gradientMSE( in, out, ModelInterface::dedw );
00132         if (!returnError)
00133           e = -1;
00134         return e;
00135     }
00136 };

00138 class RBFN_RPROP : public RBFN_MSE,
00139                    public IRpropPlus,
00140                    public ErrorMeasures
00141 {
00142   public:
00143     RBFN_RPROP( unsigned numInput, unsigned numOutput, unsigned numHidden )
00144       : RBFN_MSE( numInput, numOutput, numHidden ) { }
00145 };

00148 class RBFN_RPROP2 : public RBFN_MSE,
00149                     public RpropMinus,
00150                     public ErrorMeasures
00151 {
00152   public:
00153     RBFN_RPROP2( unsigned numInput, unsigned numOutput, unsigned numHidden )
00154       : RBFN_MSE( numInput, numOutput, numHidden ) { }
00155 };

00159 int main( int argc, char **argv )
00160 {
00161     const unsigned EmbedDim = 5;
00162     const unsigned TimeLag  = 1;
00163     const unsigned Horizon  = 1;
00164     const unsigned NumSkip  = 500;
00165     const unsigned NumTrain = 1000;
00166     const unsigned NumTest  = 1000;
00167     const unsigned NumIter  = 1000;
00168 
00169     unsigned i, t;
00170     Array< double > inTrain ( NumTrain, EmbedDim );
00171     Array< double > outTrain( NumTrain, 1        );
00172     Array< double > inTest  ( NumTest,  EmbedDim );
00173     Array< double > outTest ( NumTest,  1        );
00174 
00175     DiscreteMackeyGlass mg;
00176     IOSamples< double > iosamples( mg, EmbedDim, TimeLag, 1, Horizon );
00177 
00178     //
00179     // create samples for training and test
00180     //
00181     for( i = 0; i < NumSkip; ++i ) {
00182         ArrayReference< double > in;
00183         ArrayReference< double > out;
00184         in .copyReference( inTrain [ 0 ] );
00185         out.copyReference( outTrain[ 0 ] );
00186         iosamples( static_cast< Array< double >& >( in  ),
00187                    static_cast< Array< double >& >( out ) );
00188     }
00189     for( i = 0; i < NumTrain; ++i ) {
00190         ArrayReference< double > in;
00191         ArrayReference< double > out;
00192         in .copyReference( inTrain [ i ] );
00193         out.copyReference( outTrain[ i ] );
00194         iosamples( static_cast< Array< double >& >( in  ),
00195                    static_cast< Array< double >& >( out ) );
00196     }
00197     for( i = 0; i < NumTest; ++i ) {
00198         ArrayReference< double > in;
00199         ArrayReference< double > out;
00200         in .copyReference( inTest [ i ] );
00201         out.copyReference( outTest[ i ] );
00202         iosamples( static_cast< Array< double >& >( in  ),
00203                    static_cast< Array< double >& >( out ) );
00204     }
00205 
00206     RNG::globalRng.seed( 1 );
00207     RBFN_RPROP rbfn1( EmbedDim, 1, 10 );
00208     rbfn1.initialize( inTrain, outTrain );
00209     rbfn1.initRprop( argc > 1 ? atof( argv[ 1 ] ) : 0.0125 );
00210     RNG::globalRng.seed( 1 );
00211     RBFN_RPROP2 rbfn2( EmbedDim, 1, 10 );
00212     rbfn2.initialize( inTrain, outTrain );
00213     rbfn2.initRprop( argc > 1 ? atof( argv[ 1 ] ) : 0.0125 );
00214 
00215     for( t = 0; t < NumIter; ++t ) {
00216       //rbfn1.train( inTrain, outTrain );
00217         rbfn1.rprop( inTrain, outTrain );
00218         std::cout << t << '\t'
00219              << rbfn1.mse( inTrain, outTrain ) << '\t'
00220              << rbfn1.mse( inTest,  outTest  ) << '\t';
00221         rbfn2.rprop( inTrain, outTrain );
00222         std::cout << rbfn2.mse( inTrain, outTrain ) << '\t'
00223              << rbfn2.mse( inTest,  outTest  ) << std::endl;
00224     }
00225 
00226     return 0;
00227 }
